meanings.definition: Used as an intensifier to express annoyance or frustration.
meanings.sent1: Durned! I can't find my keys anywhere!
meanings.sent2: Oh, that durned traffic jam made me late for work.
meanings.sent3: Well, durned if I didn't forget my lunch at home again!
meanings.sent4: The durned rain ruined our picnic plans.
meanings.sent5: I was durned mad when my phone died during the important call.

meanings.sent1: That durned cat keeps knocking over my plants!
meanings.sent2: I can't believe I lost my durned wallet again.
meanings.sent3: My durned alarm clock didn't go off this morning.
meanings.sent4: The durned storm caused a power outage in our neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: I felt like a durned fool after tripping in front of everyone.
